We’re here to help you succeed!

Welcome to Acme Corp! We’re excited to have you on board. This document outlines key information about our company culture, leave policies, benefits, and employee responsibilities. ---

Company Culture

At Acme Corp, we value innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning. We encourage open communication and diversity in all forms. Every employee is empowered to contribute ideas and make a difference. ---

Working Hours and Flexibility

Our standard workweek is 40 hours, Monday through Friday. Core hours are between 10 AM to 4 PM. Employees may choose flexible schedules with manager approval. Remote work is supported across all departments, subject to team needs. ---

Leave Policy

All full-time employees are entitled to 18 days of paid annual leave, 12 days of sick leave, and 10 public holidays per year. Leave requests should be submitted at least 5 business days in advance, unless it's an emergency. Unused annual leave can be carried forward for up to 2 years. ---

Health and Wellness Benefits

We offer comprehensive health insurance including dental and vision. All employees also receive access to a fitness reimbursement program and free counseling sessions. ---

Security and Code of Conduct

Employees must follow our IT security policy, including use of VPNs for remote access and two-factor authentication. Any form of discrimination, harassment, or data misuse will result in disciplinary action. ---

Need Help? Reach out to HR or your onboarding buddy with any questions.

user_123.response: At Acme Corp, full-time employees are entitled to 18 days of paid annual leave, 12 days of sick leave, and 10 public holidays per year. Leave requests should be submitted at least 5 business days in advance unless it is an emergency. If annual leave is left unused, it can be carried forward for up to 2 years.
